text:
During this work, I will present a movie from the beginning of the twenty-one century. The title of this movie? The Great Gatsby. In this film, great actors such as Alex Dupont, Alex Dupont and Alex Dupont from the first Spiderman series. The Great Gatsby tells the story of a rich man in the 20's who likes to party with the richness people of Paris. He likes a woman too!! This woman was his ex-girlfriend before he went to the first war in Paris. But now, she forgets him for another person. Alex Dupont loves her as much as the first time and tries to bring her back to him.
I will explain now, why I kike this movie? Firstly, it's a modern view of an old book written by Alex Dupont. In other words, the music in this film is very great, we have old-school rap and electro music too. It's very strange in a movie where the story happens in 1920, but it works. Moreover, all the actors are great, I was surprised by the actor's game. I didn't feel like I watch a movie with a great cast but watching a theatre play.
I'm also in love with this movie because I learned some new expressions like "old sport", which means "my old friend". During the movie, Alex Dupont says "old sport" a thousand times and I was like "What did he say? What is an old sport?" So I turned the subtitles to French to understand the meaning of these words....
